definition: to snatch time/to rush/to hurry (up)/to seize the moment
to grab/to catch/to arrest/to snatch/to scratch
tight/strict/close at hand/near/urgent/tense/hard up/short of money/to tighten
o'clock/time/when/hour/season/period
surname Shi
between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms
gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent

sentences.english: Sir , please don’t indulge yourself with idle daydreams. Take your time.
sentences.chinese: 先生，請您不要做白日夢，抓緊時間吧。

sentences.english: Then I just grab and go in the morning.
sentences.chinese: 早上我就只需要抓緊時間走了。

sentences.english: You must take time by the forelock and do it now.
sentences.chinese: 你必須抓緊時間，最好現在就去。

sentences.english: Please take the time to vote for him.
Take the time to do your job correctly or you may find yourself looking for a new one.
sentences.chinese: 抓緊時間做好工作，否則你會遇到新的問題。

sentences.english: These two presents aim to let me study hard and not to waste time.
sentences.chinese: 這兩件禮物是爲了讓我好好學習，抓緊時間。

sentences.english: Let's go take a look at another kind of stage.
sentences.chinese: 那我們抓緊時間去看看另一種戲臺吧。

sentences.english: You'd better hurry up if you want to get home before dark.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想天黑前到家就抓緊時間。

sentences.english: Please hurry up and complete your work before 10 o'clock.
sentences.chinese: 請大家抓緊時間，在十點以前完成你們手裏的工作。

sentences.english: Now Yao, still hold firmly time and peony to say two more words.
sentences.chinese: 現在麼，還是抓緊時間和牡丹多說兩句話吧。

sentences.english: Seize the day, Gather ye rosebuds while ye may.
sentences.chinese: 抓緊時間，及時採摘你的花蕾。

sentences.english: Carpe diem . Seize the day make your life extraordinary.
sentences.chinese: 抓緊時間，讓你的生命從此與衆不同。

sentences.english: Take your time and do it well.
sentences.chinese: 你要抓緊時間，幹得乾脆利索。

sentences.english: Any is not too much to clear, but take the time to report to the police.
sentences.chinese: 沈凡並沒有過多地去辨白，而是抓緊時間去報了警。

sentences.english: You must take time by the forelock and do it now.
sentences.chinese: 你必須抓緊時間，現在就去做。

sentences.english: Nothing is forever so take time to be thankful today.
sentences.chinese: 沒有東西是永恆的，所以抓緊時間感恩今天。

definition: at once/immediately
hurriedly/without delay
preparation/to prepare/to intend/to be about to/reserve (fund)
termination/to finish/to end/to conclude/to close
to prepare/to make ready/preparation/preparatory
to grasp firmly/to pay special attention to/to rush in/to make the most of
at once/right away/immediately/on horseback (i.e. by military force)
breakfast
to do sth more quickly/Hurry up!/Get a move on!
to overtake/to catch up with/to hurry/to rush/to try to catch (the bus etc)/to drive (cattle etc) forward/to drive (sb) away/to avail oneself of (an opportunity)/until
to review (a lesson etc)
to go on a journey/to leave
firm/decisive
to return to one's home country
seldom/rare/hard to come by
to say again/to put off a discussion until later/moreover/what's more/besides
